definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: rebellion, rebelliousness, only in ´[[בֶּן־נַעֲוַת המ]] 1Sa 20:30, where read prob. [[בֶּן־נַעֲרַת הַמַרְדוּת]] son of a girl of rebelliousness = rebellious girl, cf. LXX Vulgate Th We Dr HPS; > Lag:M i. 236 f. Bu (cf. also Dr Kit) der. ´[[מ]] fr. [[רדת]], and, retaining MT, rd. a woman gone astray (v. II. [[עָוׇה]]) from discipline (Aram. sense: √ [[רְדָא]]).
